explanation: [0-0] In a scene with a grey carpet, a cartoon doll wearing a red top and white gloves is trapped in a black cage. The cage is connected to silver chains with red hooks.

[0-2] At this moment, a purple toy car drifts towards the front of the screen. One end of the silver chain is connected to the rear wing of the car, and the other end is connected to Mario. The toy car drifts forward and uses the red hook above the silver chain to take Mario out of the screen.
